original_text:
You have given no water to the weary to drink,
    and you have withheld bread from the hungry.
korean_text: 목마른 자에게 물을 마시게 하지 아니하며 주린 자에게 음식을 주지 아니하였구나

sentences.original_text: You have given no water to the weary to drink
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 지친 자에게 마실 물을 주지 않았다

sentences.original_text: and you have withheld bread from the hungry.
